SELECT vsl.id, vsl.vehicle_code, vsl.customer_name, vsl.customer_phone, vsl.id_card_number, vsl.vehicle_name, vsl.license_plate, vsl.total_amount, vsl.down_payment, vsl.period_number, vsl.monthly_contribution, vsl.actual_payment_amount, vsl.current_period_pay_status, vsl.phasing_status as phasing_status, (SELECT rr.repayment_date FROM repayment_records rr WHERE rr.vehicle_code = vsl.vehicle_code AND rr.repayment_status = 0 ORDER BY rr.repayment_date ASC LIMIT 0,1) as repayment_date, vsl.create_time, vsl.is_delete FROM vehicle_sale_info vsl LEFT JOIN repayment_records rr on vsl.vehicle_code = rr.vehicle_code where vsl.is_delete = 0
AND DATEDIFF(rr.repayment_date,NOW()) <= 3 AND DATEDIFF(rr.repayment_date,NOW()) >= 0
AND DATEDIFF(rr.repayment_date,NOW()) < 0
AND vsl.phasing_status = 1
AND vsl.current_period_pay_status = 1
AND vsl.current_period_pay_status = 0
and vsl.customer_name like CONCAT('%',#{customerName},'%')
and vsl.customer_phone like CONCAT('%',#{customerPhone},'%')
and vsl.license_plate like CONCAT('%',#{licensePlate},'%')
and vsl.vehicle_name like CONCAT('%',#{vehicleName},'%')
and vsl.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
group by vsl.id, vsl.vehicle_code, vsl.customer_name, vsl.customer_phone, vsl.id_card_number, vsl.vehicle_name, vsl.vehicle_name, vsl.license_plate, vsl.total_amount, vsl.down_payment, vsl.period_number, vsl.monthly_contribution, vsl.phasing_status, vsl.current_period_pay_status, vsl.create_time, vsl.is_delete, (SELECT rr.repayment_date FROM repayment_records rr WHERE rr.vehicle_code = vsl.vehicle_code AND rr.repayment_status = 0 ORDER BY rr.repayment_date ASC LIMIT 0,1) order by vsl.create_time desc
